title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1\WordInfo
name: WordInfo
description:
Word-specific information for recognized words.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1.WordInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: Output only. Time offset relative to the beginning of the audio, and corresponding to the start of the spoken word. This field is only set if enable_word_time_offsets=true and only in the top hypothesis. This is an experimental feature and the accuracy of the time offset can vary.

params.name: data.end_time
params.description: Output only. Time offset relative to the beginning of the audio, and corresponding to the end of the spoken word. This field is only set if enable_word_time_offsets=true and only in the top hypothesis. This is an experimental feature and the accuracy of the time offset can vary.

params.name: data.word
params.description: Output only. The word corresponding to this set of information.
